verbs.description: [V: is] freezing your credit really enough to prevent identity theft consumers can freeze and unfreeze their credit reports without paying a fee effective sept 21 however they still need to contact all three credit bureaus if they want to cover all their bases equifax thaw transunion ulzehimer freezing attorney john heath lexington law salt lake city president atlanta identity john ulzheimer fraud experian credit national consumer telecom the ulzheimer group u s pirg
